references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many time series generation methods, including those used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, which supports the adoption of diffusion models in this paper for time series editing.

references.paper_title: Csdi: Conditional score-based diffusion models for probabilistic time series imputation
references.reason: This paper introduces conditional score-based diffusion models for time series imputation, a closely related task to this paper's time series editing, and directly contributes to the methodology.

references.paper_title: Time weaver: A conditional time series generation model
references.reason: This paper introduces a conditional time series generation model, a direct competitor to the proposed method in this paper, enabling a comparative analysis.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the CLIP model, which is adapted in this paper for evaluating the alignment between generated time series and their attributes.
